vote.title: To amend Columbus City Codes Section 362.013 in order to allow for the deposit of proceeds received from 25% of the City's existing municipal income tax to a subfund of the general fund and to clarify the allowable uses for such monies; to authorize Fund 4430 to be renamed as Debt Retirement Fund; to repeal Ordinance 1974-2011; and to declare an emergency.
vote.description: A motion was made by Shannon G. Hardin, seconded by Mitchell Brown, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
